General.Name: China Catalyst Holding Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: China Catalyst Holding Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of zeolites catalyst, specialty process package solutions, and fine chemicals. It offers molecular sieve catalysts; process design solutions for methanol to propylene conversion, preparing propylene oxide by propylene and hydrogen peroxide, hydrogen synthesis, and ketone oxime synthesis; and fine chemicals, such as tetrapropylammonium hydroxide, N,N,N-trimethyl-1-ammonium adamantine, tetrapropylammonium hydroxide, and 2-tert-amylanthraquinone. The company was formerly known as Dalian Heterogeneous Catalyst Co., Ltd. and changed its name to China Catalyst Holding Co., Ltd. in November 2015. China Catalyst Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is based in Dalian, China.
